DOC.brief_summary: A simulated clinical use test Save ' N'Sound 1mL stake Passive Delivery System add-on extend finger flange
DOC.brief_title: Simulated Clinical Use Testing Safe ' N'Sound 1ML Stalked Passive Delivery System With Add-On Extended Finger Flanges
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim evaluate safety use Safe ' N'Sound 1mL stake passive delivery system cone version add-on EFF prevention needle stick injury evaluate user 's satisfaction regard handle characteristic product namely safety , design ease use .
DOC.criteria: The Evaluator must : Minimum age 18 Able understand provide sign consent study Willing comply study protocol , include willing answer question complete questionnaire Have concern ability perform simulate injection With financial interest sponsor ( Nemera ) CRO ( NAMSA ) If opinion CRO , include observer/monitor , potential evaluator good candidate study , include reason mental health .
